basics.name: Daniel Leitón
basics.label: FullStack Web Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer emphasized on analysis, design, programming and implementation of WEB Information Systems. I'm good at abstracting requirements and process systematization, as well as to develop computer solutions. I'm a result-oriented professional and I have ability to work in teams giving creative ideas, ability to learn and adapt my self to new technologies. I like organizational dynamism. Currently studying a Master's Degree in Information Systems.

work.summary: Developing great ideas to solve real society problems via technology.
Making Software Engineering Solutions for the IBM Cloud Infrastructure Teams.
Working on internal projects made from the scratch using ReactJS and NodeJS, on a micro-service oriented architecture, using git as code control system and agile development methodology.

Senior Consultant in the IT field, working on large software projects with different technologies, including Oracle, Microsoft and OpenSource tools. Contractor at Intel, making application support on .NET and AngularJS applications.

As part of the IT Department at Alimentos Prosalud, my responsibilities were the development and support of .NET Applications, as well as the development and support of features over JDEdwards. Between the different KPIs I have had succesful performance, include Team Leading in Software Development as well as research about new Technologies such as Modern Web Development, Development in SharePoint online environment and Office 365 apps. Oracle Application Express is another technology I had to deal with.

As Business Intelligence Intern at GBM Costa Rica, I developed a complete BI Model using Cognos BI Suite 10 which included: - ETL From SAP CRM. - Construction of Data Metamodel (Fact table and Dimensions). - Reporting services. All of this work was made in order to find out the Percentage Of SLA Fulfillment with customers.
highlights: Made a great Individual Final Project

work.summary: As Information Systems Analyst at the Computer Center of ITCR, I had the opportunity to develop a ASP.NET forms application which collects important information about all the students of the University, for the Department of Social Work and Health.
At my family's company, I worked managing the inventory, giving support to the process of the accounting cycle, configuring the web hosting and organizing digital documentation of the enterprise.
